title: Club of Hill Giant Strength
content:
much, every splinter vibrates with barely-contained power.

Club Location & Where to Find

Location: Found by breaking the stool on top of Arcane Tower, AFTER you sat on it Dropped by: Stool of Hill Giant Strength

Club Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 600 Gp. Weight: 0.9 Kg. UUID: 768010ce-dcfe-43bb-8398-2d681d4fa6eb Sets wielder's Strength to 19.

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dag
